SQLLoaderMapping.name: Turnover parameters
SQLLoaderMapping.fetch_sql:
SELECT DISTINCT
                hw_foliage AS foliage,
                stem_turnover AS stem,
                hw_branch AS branch,
                stem_snag,
                branch_snag,
                coarse_root,
                fine_root,
                branch_snag_split,
                coarse_ag_split,
                fine_ag_split
            FROM turnover_parameter
            UNION
            SELECT DISTINCT
                sw_foliage AS foliage,
                stem_turnover AS stem,
                sw_branch AS branch,
                stem_snag,
                branch_snag,
                coarse_root,
                fine_root,
                branch_snag_split,
                coarse_ag_split,
                fine_ag_split
            FROM turnover_parameter
